amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Youth Conservation Program; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) At-risk youth means a youth who has a barrier to successful employment, demonstrates low income by living in a household with income that falls below the federal poverty guidelines or by receiving public assistance, has been impacted directly by substance abuse or physical abuse, has had negative contact with law enforcement, or is not experiencing success in school and is in jeopardy of dropping out; and
(2) Commission means the Game and Parks Commission.
